news.title: Prediction markets should become hedging platforms, says Buterin
news.titleOriginal: Prediction markets should become hedging platforms, says Buterin
news.summary: Prediction markets should pivot from short-term betting and move toward becoming price stability instruments for consumers, Buterin argued.

news.title: X exec Nikita Bier says in-app trading coming in a 'couple' of weeks

news.summary: An announcement in January teased the potential in-app trading feature, fueling online speculation about X's upcoming Smart Cashtags.

news.title: All social program benefits can be distributed onchain: Compliance exec
news.titleOriginal: All social program benefits can be distributed onchain: Compliance exec
news.summary: Hong Kong, Thailand, and the Marshall Islands are exploring tokenized debt instruments and administering social benefit programs onchain.

news.title: Figure Technology suffers data breach, exposing personal customer details
news.titleOriginal: Figure Technology suffers data breach, exposing personal customer details
news.summary: ShinyHunters hackers leaked user data after a social-engineering attack on a Figure employee and the company reportedly refused to pay a ransom.
